typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		work as string,
		age as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'delimited',
	container: 'outputblob',
	fileName: 'testDataset.csv',
	columnDelimiter: ',',
	escapeChar: '\\',
	qutoChar: '\"',
	encodingName: 'UTF-8',
	columnNamesAsHeader: true) ~> sourceNew
sourceNew sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
